subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: West Virginia pounded Rutgers but were awaiting the outcome of the Connecticut-South Florida game later Saturday that would determine the conference’s automatic B.C.S. representative.
snippet: West Virginia pounded Rutgers but were awaiting the outcome of the Connecticut-South Florida game later Saturday that would determine the conference’s automatic B.C.S. representative.
